creator: ravisomepalli@yahoo.com
text:
I am using 1.5.3 with windows and using ejbjar optional task. I was not able to 
make ant script to look for the localDTD.

I got rid of this problem by modifying the IPlanetDeploymentTool.java 
How do I report, transfer this bugfix into the future ant releases.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
Create a patch and attach it to this report.  On the "create a patch" part, please
refer to http://jakarta.apache.org/site/source.html#Patches if you are not
familiar with it.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: Is this a duplicate of bug 16966?

creator: stevel@apache.org
text:
this is either a duplicate or,  being iplanet related, not something that should
be actively maintained. iPlanet is a deceased product.
